texts: Srikar Vuppala srikarvuppala003@gmail.com | (346) 530 8226 | https://linkedin.com/in/srikar003 PROFESSIONAL SUMMARY Results-driven engineer with 6+ years building production-grade platforms and web applications in Python, JavaScript, and C#. Master’s in Computer Science (Data Science) and hands-on leadership of AI/ML, MLOps, and Generative AI initiatives on AWS and Google Cloud Platform. Proven record of translating data-science prototypes into containerized microservices, automating end-to-end ML lifecycles, and scaling cloud infrastructure with Kubernetes and Airflow. Passionate mentor and agile practitioner who thrives in pair-programming environments and ships value early & often. SKILLS Languages: JavaScript, TypeScript, Python, C#, Java, SQL, HTML5, CSS3 Frameworks & Runtimes: React, Angular, Node.js, Express, Flask, .NET Architecture & Patterns: Microservices, Event Sourcing, CQRS, RESTful APIs AI & NLP: OpenAI GPT‑4/4o APIs, Prompt Engineering, AI‑driven Document Extraction & OCR Relational Databases: PostgreSQL, MySQL, Redis (Prisma, Knex, Bookshelf) DevOps & Cloud: AWS (ECR, EC2, S3, CodeArtifact), GCP (Cloud Build, GKE, Vertex AI, BigQuery), Azure Pipelines, Docker, Kubernetes, Airflow Messaging & Monitoring: Kafka, Redis Streams, Kibana, Grafana Security: OAuth 2.0, Checkmarx, StackRox, WhiteSource Collaboration & Tools: Git, Jira, Confluence, Azure Boards, Miro, Figma Testing: Test‑Driven Development (TDD), Vitest, Jest, Jasmine/Karma WORK EXPERIENCE Software Engineer | Aug 2024 - present RADIX SOFTWARE, INC. ● Drove Mach 1 ML-style platform adoption on GCP: built reusable Python micro-framework (FastAPI) that wraps LLM-powered document extractors; deployed to GKE clusters via automated Cloud Build deployments, cutting prototype-to-production cycle 45%. ● Designed Airflow DAGs orchestrating daily PDF-to-XLSX conversions for 200+ rent-roll docs; achieved 99.5% pipeline uptime and freed analysts from manual uploads. ● Introduced GitHub Actions + Cloud Build CI/CD for container images; reduced deploy time from 30 min to <10 min with automated zero-downtime rollouts. ● Designed and launched Marketplace, a Node.js-backed feature that surfaces real-estate deals; early metrics show a 30 % uptick in user engagement within the first quarter. ● Paired with data scientists to fine-tune GPT-4-based extractors; boosted field-level accuracy from 75 → 90% and reduced post-processing effort 60%. ● Led PoC on Vertex AI Feature Store for centralizing training data; validated latency <50 ms for real-time look-ups. ● Mentored 4 engineers in pair programming, test-driven development, and Kubernetes best practices.

ement within the first quarter. ● Paired with data scientists to fine-tune GPT-4-based extractors; boosted field-level accuracy from 75 → 90% and reduced post-processing effort 60%. ● Led PoC on Vertex AI Feature Store for centralizing training data; validated latency <50 ms for real-time look-ups. ● Mentored 4 engineers in pair programming, test-driven development, and Kubernetes best practices. ● Built AIProperties - an Angular + Flask proof-of-concept that leverages OpenAI to demo a future market-analytics feature - reducing insight turnaround time for analysts by 70% and generating property analytics 5× faster than the previous workflow. Software Engineer | Jan 2018 - Aug 2024 BERKADIA COMMERCIAL MORTGAGE LLC ● Modernized legacy mortgage platform to React + Node.js microservices, shrinking release lead

time 60% and improving page-load performance 45%. ● Containerized ML risk-scoring models with Docker and scheduled batch scoring in Airflow/Kubernetes, increasing throughput 4×. ● Built RESTful APIs in Node.js & Python with TDD (85%+ coverage), slashing post-release defects 30%. ● Implemented event-sourced DDD backend; quadrupled throughput in load tests and enhanced fault-tolerance. ● Engineered Angular single-page applications that automated Excel-based workflows, cutting loan-processing time from 3 hours to just 15 minutes. ● Developed Infrastructure-as-Code modules across AWS environments using CloudFormation, collaborating with architects to evaluate GCP BigQuery & Cloud Composer, identifying $30k/yr savings opportunity. ● Embedded security scanning (Checkmarx, StackRox) into CI/CD; maintained zero-critical vulnerabilities in 30+ repos. ● Championed pair programming & DevOps culture, onboarding 6 new engineers and boosting team velocity 20%. ACADEMIC EDUCATION University of Houston – Clear Lake Master of Science in Computer Science (Data Science Specialization) 2021 – 2022 | GPA: 3.86 ● Member, UHCL Student Coding Hub Vardhaman College of Engineering Bachelor of Science in Computer Science 2014 – 2018 | GPA: 9.02 ● Best Outgoing Student Award ● Member, Computer Engineers Technical Association ACADEMIC PROJECTS Blockchain Web Client Consortium | Aug 2022 - Dec 2022 Led the design and development of a blockchain-based application, creating frontend components, middleware, and backend APIs for blockchain interactions. Technologies: Angular, Node.js, Golang. Student Networking Application | Sep 2021 - Dec 2021 Built the User Interactive Web platform performing tasks like developing UI components for web page design, developed APIs in spring boot for backend communication and interacting with SQL for data storage. My major focus was related to understanding requirements, designing databases, normalizing them, and providing referential integrity. Technologies: Angular, Spring boot, MySQL. ACHIEVEMENTS Certificate of Excellence – Zero vulnerabilities maintained across multiple applications. Hackathon Winner 2023 – Built a message correlation tool that reduced debugging time for DDD systems. Outstanding Performer – Recognized in 2019 & 2020 at Berkadia; recipient of multiple Hi-Fi awards. Techfest 2016 Winner – National coding competition, IIT Bombay. Active contributor to Work-Life Balance (WoLiBa) and Security Awareness initiatives at Berkadia.

Srikar Vuppala srikarvuppala003@gmail.com | (346) 530-8226 | LinkedIn PROFESSIONAL SUMMARY Results-driven Software Engineer with an M.S. in Computer Science and 6+ years of experience building scalable full-stack applications and Python-based data processing pipelines using PySpark. Strong background in designing and deploying microservices, event-driven systems, and AI-powered platforms, including large-scale document processing and NLP workflows leveraging OpenAI LLMs. Proven expertise in distributed data processing, ETL pipelines, and cloud-native architectures across AWS and Azure. Experienced in Agile and SAFe Lean environments, with a track record of improving system performance, data accuracy, and delivery efficiency while mentoring cross-functional teams and shipping high-impact, production-ready solutions. SKILLS ● Languages: Python, PySpark, JavaScript, TypeScript, HTML5, CSS3, C#, Java, SQL ● Frameworks & Runtimes: Angular, React, Node.js, Express, Flask, .NET ● Architecture & Patterns: Microservices, Event Sourcing, CQRS, RESTful APIs ● Big Data & Data Processing: Apache Spark (PySpark), Distributed Data Processing, ETL Pipelines, Pandas, NumPy, Data Validation, Data Quality Checks ● AI & NLP: OpenAI GPT-4/4o APIs, Prompt Engineering, NLP, AI-driven Doc.
